alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lauderdale-By-The-Sea to North Miami Beach to Palmetto Bay. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Miramar, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, South Miami, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Surfside, Hallandale, Virginia Key, Miami Gardens, Kendall, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Oakland Park, Aventura, Dania Beach and Sunny Isles Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
